book-course.title: Book a course
book-course.notice: Please make sure email(s) is entered correctly. Course registration details will be sent to email address(es).
book-course.review-tnc: I confirm that I wish to participate in the course even if it starts during my 14 day cancellation period. I understand that I will lose my right to cancel the contract once the course is complete and that I must pay for services provided prior to cancellation.
book-course.pay-by-cc: Pay by credit card (Corporate Card only)
book-course.pay-by-cc-info:
Payment by credit card allows you to secure your registration(s) immediately.

After you confirm your order you will be taken to a secure page where you can pay online with an additional charge of 1.4% + 20p per transaction.

*Team Teach Limited holds no liability if a consumer card is used.
book-course.pay-by-inv-info: Please note that payment is due at least 8 weeks before the course begins. If the course begins less than 8 weeks, then payment is due immediately.
book-course.order-success-info: Your order has been successfully submitted.
book-course.order-success-msg: Each attendee will receive an email with the necessary course instructions once this order has been processed and approved.
book-course.payment-cc-title: Pay by Credit Card (Corporate Card only)
book-course.payment-cc-subtitle: Enter your card details below and press Pay finalize your order

information.p1: In order for Team Teach Ltd to keep accurate and up-to-date records of your personal data, training certification and remind you of when your certification is due for renewal, we require your permission to collect and store your personal data on our training management system in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
information.health-check-label: I confirm that I have read and understood the Health Guidance & Training Information leaflet distributed prior to this course, and I agree to abide by the participant conduct instructions as issued by the lead trainer.
information.p2: The Health guidance &training information leaflet should be found in the email containing the Course Instructions. If this is missing, please contact Team Teach.
information.risk-check-label: I agree to adhere to all Team Teach Training Protocols. Participants are encouraged to take personal responsibility for conducting their own risk assessments and may opt out of an activity at any time. Course members are asked not to offer any resistance when learning techniques during practical sessions.
information.p3: Please enter the full name that matches with your account. Your signature confirms the information provided is an accurate representation of your experience.

questions.ISSUES_ARISING_FROM_COURSE: Were there any issues arising from the course?

course-evaluation.disclaimer: Your ratings and comments are appreciated as the course involves physical participation including attention to Health and Safety issues working within the Team Teach Code of Practice. By completing this evaluation, you consent to Team Teach collecting and processing this data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR). See our Privacy Policy for more.
